value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.title: Aggregation to speed up the performance of a Power BI report even if all IMPORTED

This video is about this question and shows how you can speed up your model

value.title: How to use AddColumns function in DAX and Power BI

value.title: Know Your Data Better by Column Profiling In Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: An essential step towards a better analytics solution is to know your data. You have to know your data to be able to determine key columns, to learn what transformations need to be done, and etc. Power Query provides a very useful way of knowing your data in Power BI.
